description: Provides a Hetzner Cloud Reverse DNS Entry to create, modify and reset reverse dns entries for Hetzner Cloud Floating IPs or servers.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DnsPtr.description:
The DNS address the `ip_address` should resolve to.
- `ip_address` - (Required, string) The IP address that should point to `dns_ptr`.
- `server_id` - (Required, int) The server the `ip_address` belongs to.
- `floating_ip_id` - (Required, int) The Floating IP the `ip_address` belongs to.

FloatingIpId.description: The Floating IP the `ip_address` belongs to.

IpAddress.description:
The IP address that should point to `dns_ptr`.
- `server_id` - (Required, int) The server the `ip_address` belongs to.
- `floating_ip_id` - (Required, int) The Floating IP the `ip_address` belongs to.

ServerId.description:
The server the `ip_address` belongs to.
- `floating_ip_id` - (Required, int) The Floating IP the `ip_address` belongs to.
